snippet: A lengthy recession has heightened demands for an overhaul of political parties and institutions tainted by corruption, including the monarchy.
abstract: Crown Prince Felipe of Spain is preparing to be crowned as Felipe VI, replacing his father, King Juan Carlos; as incoming king he will have many opportunities to test his powers of conciliation and persuasion; lengthy recession has heightened demands for an overhaul of political parties and institutions tainted by corruption, including Spain's monarchy.
lead_paragraph: A lengthy recession has heightened demands for an overhaul of political parties and institutions tainted by corruption, including the monarchy.

headline.main: Spain’s Incoming King Takes Over a Throne Heavy With Political Tension
headline.print_headline: Spain’s Incoming King Takes Over a Throne Heavy With Political Tension

keywords.value: Juan Carlos I, King of Spain
keywords.name: persons
